entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
